pynamics.kinematics.joint.Joint¶

class pynamics.kinematics.joint.Joint¶

Abstract base class defining the Joint interface

abstract __init__()¶

Methods

__init__()

get_T()

Get the affine transform across the joint.

get_acceleration(q_dd)

Get the acceleration across the joint, a_J.

get_c()

Get c_J for the joint, as defined on pg.

get_configuration()

Get the joint space position, q.

get_configuration_d()

Get the joint space velocity dot{q}.

get_constraint_force_subspace()

The T matrix for the joint, converting the constraint sub-space force to the cartesian space force across a joint.

get_motion_subspace()

The S matrix for the joint, converting joint-space velocity to cartesian space velocity.

get_rotation_matrix()

Get the rotation matrix across a joint, transforming vectors from the child body frame to the parent body frame.

get_translation_vector()

Get the translation vector across a joint, expressed in the child body frame.

get_velocity()

Get the velocity across the joint, v_J.

initialize_integrator()

Initialize the state of the integrator with the current state of the joint

integrate(dt, q_dd)

Use the integrator to increment the state (q) and velocity (dot{q})

set_configuration(configuration)

Set the joint space position q.

set_configuration_d(configuration_d)

Set the joint space velocity, dot{q}.
